title: Sent foods, water supply and tents to Sindhupalchowk
content: Provided $200 to Navaraj Acharya (Ex. Kantipur TV associate) on 04/30/2015, who is coordinating with the volunteer friends from KTV who are trying to reach out for  urgent help with some food, water supply & some tents to sindhupalchowk & other places where people are still awaiting for basic needs.
